title: Leading SAFe®
desc: Leading SAFe ? Leading the Lean-Agile Software Enterprise with the Scaled Agile Framework ? ? SAFe ?  Agilist Training (SA) In this two-day course, attendees will gain the knowledge necessary to lead an enterprise-level Agile transformation by leveraging the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) and its underlying principles of Lean thinking and Product Development Flow. Attendees will develop an understanding of how the principles and practices of the framework support Lean thinking, Agile Development, SAFe ScrumXP, Agile Release Train, Agile Portfolio Management, Agile Architecture and Scaling Leadership. Whether at the team, program or portfolio level, attendees will be able to explain and implement the practices necessary to achieve business and technical alignment and consistent, sustainable delivery of value. If you are interested in acquiring more information please visit our website. ? Please contact us at? contact-us@davisbase.com ?or via phone at?1 877-DAVIS-10 ( 877-328-4710) for group pricing.
